tool_description: This news scrapper gets all the current news
name: News Scrapper
title: News Scrapper

api_list.name: get specific news
api_list.description: get news from the big 3 news stations listed

api_list.name: Get all current news
api_list.description: this endpoint will return all current news
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://news-scrapper.p.rapidapi.com/news"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "news-scrapper.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://news-scrapper.p.rapidapi.com/news"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "news-scrapper.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
